description: Total multiplicity of the eigenvalue 0 in the spectra of the n^(n-2) labeled trees on n vertices.
links: M. Bauer and O. Golinelli, On the kernel of tree incidence matrices, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 3 (2000), #00.1.4.
formula: a(n) = n^{n-1} - 2 * Sum_{2 <= m <= n}(-1)^m * n^(n-m)*m^(m-2)*binom(n-1, m-1).G.f. satisfies x^2+2*x-x*e^x = Sum_{n >= 1} (a_n/n!) (x*e^x*e^(-x*e^x))^n.
mathematica: a[n_] := n^(n - 1) - 2*Sum[(-1)^m*n^(n - m)*m^(m - 2)*Binomial[n - 1, m - 1], {m, 2, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 18}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 10 2012, from formula *)
author: Michel Bauer (bauer(AT)spht.saclay.cea.fr), Jan 20 2000
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Dec 08 2000
